newsitem.title: USA: Next Austin, Texas, GO bond sale expected in Sept.
newsitem.headline: Next Austin, Texas, GO bond sale expected in Sept.

text.p: The next general obligation bond sale of Austin, Texas, is expected to take place in September and total $35 million to $40 million, Deputy Treasurer Dennis Waley said.

"The size of the offering depends on what projects we put into the bond sale, and that's something that requires (Austin City) Council approval," Waley said. "And when they approve that, we will determine an estimate of debt service costs, and we will have to put that into the budget to set a tax rate, so it kind of works together."
The budget process begins in June, with a proposed budget tentatively expected by August 13, he said. An approved budget is expected by mid-September.
